segments.text: I want to keep a pet , but I don't know which one to buy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dogs are nice , but they are really energetic , and you need to make sure they get enough exercise every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Having a dog would probably be too much work for me , then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What about cats ? They are more independent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I was thinking of something a little more exotic . I don't want a common pet like a dog or a cat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about a lizard ? Are lizards more along the lines of what you were thinking of getting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , are they easy to look after ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , they are pretty low-maintenance ; they eat almost anything .
segments.speaker: S2
